buyTokens(uint256,uint256).custom:effects: - Transfers tokens between the buyer and the contract - Updates the auction state - May settle the auction if all tokens are sold
buyTokens(uint256,uint256).custom:internal-logic: - Retrieves the auction data - Calls the buyTokens function of the DutchAuctionLibrary - Updates the amount of SUMMER raised in the auction - Settles the auction if all tokens are sold
buyTokens(uint256,uint256).custom:override: Implements the buyTokens function from IBuyAndBurn
buyTokens(uint256,uint256).custom:security-considerations: - Ensure proper token transfers and balance updates - Handle potential reentrancy risks
buyTokens(uint256,uint256).details: Allows users to buy tokens from an ongoing auction

params.amount: The amount of tokens to buy

returns.summerAmount: The amount of SUMMER tokens required to purchase the specified amount of auction tokens

finalizeAuction(uint256).custom:effects: - Updates the auction state - Burns SUMMER tokens - Cleans up auction-related state
finalizeAuction(uint256).custom:internal-logic: - Retrieves the auction data - Calls the finalizeAuction function of the DutchAuctionLibrary - Settles the auction - if all tokens are sold, the auction is settled automatically
finalizeAuction(uint256).custom:override: Implements the finalizeAuction function from IBuyAndBurn
finalizeAuction(uint256).custom:security-considerations: - Ensure proper handling of remaining tokens and raised funds
finalizeAuction(uint256).details: Finalizes an auction after its end time

params.auctionId: The ID of the auction to finalize

returns.auction: The Auction struct containing auction details

returns._0: The current price of tokens in the auction

startAuction(address).custom:effects: - Creates a new auction - Updates the ongoingAuctions mapping - Emits a BuyAndBurnAuctionStarted event
startAuction(address).custom:internal-logic: - Checks if there's already an ongoing auction for the token - Creates a new auction using the current balance of the token - Stores the auction data and updates the ongoingAuctions mapping
startAuction(address).custom:override: Implements the startAuction function from IBuyAndBurn
startAuction(address).custom:security-considerations: - Only callable by the governor - Ensure the contract has the necessary token balance before starting the auction
startAuction(address).details: Starts a new auction for a specified token

params.tokenToAuction: The address of the token to be auctioned

updateAuctionDefaultParameters((uint40,u.details: Only callable by the governorEmits an AuctionDefaultParametersUpdated event

getAuctionInfo(uint256).notice: Retrieves information about a specific auction

getCurrentPrice(uint256).notice: Gets the current price of tokens in an ongoing auction

updateAuctionDefaultParameters((uint40,u.notice: Updates the default parameters for future auctions
